The fireball spit by {{Class|Sorcerer1|D'Sparil's chaos serpent}}, faster and twice as damaging as the {{Class|Demon1FX1|fireballs}} from a regular {{Class|Demon1|chaos serpent}}. The sprites used by Heretic and Hexen are the same (except for a very subtle color shift from the different palette), but the spawn sprites are numbered differently: FX14A* corresponds to DMFXC*, FX14B* to DMFXB*, and FX14C* to DMFXA*. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SorcererFX1 { {{Property|Radius}} 10 {{Property|Height}} 10 {{Property|Speed}} 20 {{Property|FastSpeed}} 28 {{Property|Damage}} 10 {{Property|DamageType}} {{DamageType|Fire}} {{Property|Projectile}} -{{Flag|ACTIVATEIMPACT}} -{{Flag|ACTIVATEPCROSS}} {{Property|RenderStyle}} Add States { Spawn: FX14 ABC 6 Bright Loop Death: FX14 DEFGH 5 Bright Stop } }
